title: 21 Sleepy Cat Memes Taking a 21-Hour Nap to Gather the Energy to Help Hoomans Laugh Again
description: Did you know cats sleep for about 300 hours a day? They're like the napping champions of the world. People might wrongly assume the napping champions would be sloths, but they're wrong. While sloths earned their full respect for their sleeping abilities - cats do it all while living with us, haughty hoomans, who would, in theory, disrupt every attempt for cats to sleep - but somehow, they succeed. Despite hoomans making all this noise around the house, despite hoomans deciding to pet the cats while they take their afternoon nap - cats can sleep for like a bajillion amount of time.Since cats are the kings and queens of memes, and also the running champions of wild wide napping - it's no wonder there are so many memes with these combined concepts in them. We gathered a bunch of sleepy cat memes for you to show your cat, only once they wake up, of course… We wouldn't want to interrupt their cutie patootie sleep… Would we?
author: Ayala Sorotsky
excerpt: 21 Sleepy Cat Memes Taking a 21-Hour Nap to Gather the Energy to Help Hoomans Laugh Again - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals
text: That. Is. The. Most. Adorable. Sleeping. Position. To. Have. Ever. Exist. Just look at this cutie, how he squishes his own face because his nose is cold. Isn't that the most adorable thing you've seen for at least a week? Our hearts just cannot deal with this amount of cuteness. What are you supposed to do? What do you mean by this question? It's obvious - you need to stop what you're doing there with this computer, doesn't matter if it's working, studying, or gaming - and pet your orange fluffs! They came to nap on you for pet purposes. Go on, do what you need to do as a cat pawrent.
html:
That. Is. The. Most. Adorable. Sleeping. Position. To. Have. Ever. Exist. Just look at this cutie, how he squishes his own face because his nose is cold. Isn't that the most adorable thing you've seen for at least a week? Our hearts just cannot deal with this amount of cuteness.

What are you supposed to do? What do you mean by this question? It's obvious - you need to stop what you're doing there with this computer, doesn't matter if it's working, studying, or gaming - and pet your orange fluffs! They came to nap on you for pet purposes. Go on, do what you need to do as a cat pawrent.
